title: Logs service interruption
body:
• We detected that the log service is currently not accessible. Dashboards and logs view are currently not available. Filtering service is not affected. (15:53 — Oct 17)

  • Log service is up again. (16:12 — Oct 17)

A wrong ansible log was run. Logs collection has been interrupted between 15:48 CEST and 16:12 CEST. Logs within this timeframe are lost.
